mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_user(id, user_name, password, gender, email, bio, register_ip, register_brand, register_model, imei) VALUES (#{id}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{bio}, #{registerIp}, #{registerBrand}, #{registerModel}, #{IMEI})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_user WHERE id=#{id} OR user_name=#{userName} OR email=#{email}
